casebody.data:
Jason Lee MUTTER
v.
Michael BALL, Superintendent of Avery Mitchell Correctional Institution. No. 150P16. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 26, 2016. Jason Lee Mutter, for Mutter, Jason Lee. Mike Ball, Superintendant, for Ball, Michael. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, for Ball, Michael. Todd Williams, District Attorney.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Petitioner on the 22nd of April 2016 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 25th of April 2016."
ERVIN, J. recused.
